pageIntro: Here is a detailed overview of the key skills I have gained through professional training, hackathons, and real-world project experience.

skills.title: Accounting Skills
skills.description: Completed CPA Level 1 and awaiting to write the professional exam.

skills.title: Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning
skills.description: Specialized in Computer Vision, a skill acquired through a Microsoft–JKUAT sponsored AI hackathon.

skills.title: Data Analytics
skills.description: Experienced in Python and NumPy, gained through hands-on experience in multiple analytical projects.

skills.title: AR / VR Development
skills.description: Experienced in building virtual reality platforms for the National Research Fund and Origin Research & Innovation Labs.

skills.title: Physical Agentic AI Development
skills.description: A skill gained during the 2025 Intervarsity Oracle–JKUAT AI Hackathon, integrating AI with robotics.

skills.title: GPS & Mapping Systems
skills.description: Developed experience through building the Murang’a University of Technology navigation system.
